text: Gary Fleder is an American movie director, screenwriter, and producer. He is known for the movie Homefront, released by Open Road Films and Millennium Films in November 2013. ==Movies== *Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead (1995) *Kiss the Girls (1997) *Don't Say a Word (2001) *Impostor (2001) *Runaway Jury (2003) *The Express: The Ernie Davis Story (2008) *Homefront (2013) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1965 births Category:Living people
title: Gary Fleder
